attributes.action: Close all charity shops receiving donations due to the impact of COVID-19.
attributes.additional_details: It has been scientifically proven that the coronavirus can last up to 9 days on various surfaces such as metal, glass or plastic. It is not known yet how long the virus can survive on clothing, however, it it harder to disinfect the fabrics and the virus might be stuck to the fibres (said Vincent Munster- head of the virus ecology section at Rocky Mountain Laboratories). Charity shops are putting their employees in risk by allowing them to sort donations and handling second-hand clothes.
attributes.background: The government should shut down all charity shops receiving donations due to the growth of Covid-19 pandemic in the UK. Introducing sick pay to all employees until the further notice.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that non essential retail shops, including charity shops are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
